input:

14:26 Caption: Hernanes plays a lovely pass into Mauro Icardi (Inter), but he can't find the target. His strike from inside the box goes narrowly over the crossbar. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Lazio.
15:11 Event: Ball out of play
15:13 Caption: Lazio are showing great team chemistry. They are passing the ball around seamlessly.
15:34 Event: Throw-in by Inter
16:35 Caption: Miroslav Klose (Lazio) tries to find Antonio Candreva with a clever through ball from the corner of the box, but the defence is alert to the danger and makes a clearance.
16:37 Event: Shots on target by Lazio
16:38 Event: Shots off target by Lazio
16:39 Event: Ball out of play
16:52 Caption: Marco Parolo (Lazio) is quickest to the rebound and shoots towards the middle of the net, but the goalkeeper pulls off a comfortable save to deny him.
17:21 Event: Corner by Lazio
17:25 Caption: The ball rebounds to Marco Parolo (Lazio) around the penalty spot and he produces a header towards the goal. Unfortunately for him, one of the defenders prevents the ball from ending in the net. The referee blows his whistle, Lazio are awarded a corner kick.

18:04 Event: Ball out of play

19:33 Event: Shots off target by Lazio
19:36 Event: Ball out of play
19:45 Caption: Antonio Candreva (Lazio) unleashes a shot from 20 metres out but is unable to find the target and it goes well wide of the right post.
19:47 Event: Clearance by Inter
21:15 Caption: Antonio Candreva (Lazio) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Samir Handanovic, who smothers the ball.
21:16 Event: Foul by Lazio
21:31 Caption: Michael Ciani (Lazio) makes a slide tackle, but referee Davide Massa blows for a foul.

22:39 Event: Indirect free-kick by Inter
22:53 Event: Ball out of play

23:21 Event: Foul by Lazio

23:28 Event: Red card by Lazio
23:35 Caption: Mauricio (Lazio) makes an awful challenge on his opponent and the referee shows him a deserved red card! Another situation results in a direct free kick for Inter.
23:46 Event: Yellow card by Lazio
23:58 Caption: The main referee, Davide Massa, is apparently not going to tolerate any discussions. Stefano Mauri (Lazio) is given a yellow card for dissent.

29:21 Event: Clearance by Lazio

42:47 Caption: Edson Braafheid (Lazio) didn't hesitate to knock his opponent down with a harsh sliding tackle. Davide Massa could probably show him a yellow, but he only goes with blowing the whistle for a foul. Inter are awarded a free kick from a dangerous position.
43:34 Event: Indirect free-kick by Inter
43:36 Event: Shots on target by Inter
43:37 Event: Ball out of play
43:42 Caption: Fredy Guarin (Inter) stands over the free kick and opts to take it himself, sending it towards the right post only for Etrit Berisha to dive and make a save.
43:54 Event: Corner by Inter
43:57 Event: Ball out of play

44:26 Event: Ball out of play
44:51 Caption: A dangerous towering header by Nemanja Vidic (Inter) from around the penalty spot goes just wide of the right post. This corner kick didn't change the score.
45:20 Caption: Fredy Guarin (Inter) is writhing in pain and can now receive medical treatment after the referee decides to stop play.
45:53 Caption: Fourth official shows 2 min. of added time.
46:06 Caption: The referee blows his whistle as Danilo D'Ambrosio (Inter) was too aggressive in his challenge.
46:16 Caption: Lazio win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
46:58 Caption: Fredy Guarin (Inter) is moving okay again after that injury scare.
47:06 Caption: Lucas Biglia (Lazio) stands over the free kick and opts to take it himself, sending it towards the top of net only for Samir Handanovic to dive and make a save. Lazio will take a corner kick.
47:39 Caption: The resulting corner from Lucas Biglia (Lazio) is cleared.
47:54 Caption: The match has reached half-time.
47:59 Caption: So far we have been witnesses to an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will not be a decline in the spectacle in the second half. No side has really dominated in this first half. Both sides rely mostly on counter-attacks for their chances.

Second Half:
00:00 Event: Kick-off by Inter
00:00 Event: Substitution by Inter
00:00 Event: Substitution by Inter

00:01 Caption: Everything is set for the start of the second half.
01:53 Caption: Inter keep the ball and are displaying some tiki-taka style passing at the moment.
02:08 Event: Ball out of play

06:21 Caption: Hernanes (Inter) takes the resultant free kick from the edge of the box and tries to find one of his teammates with a cross, but the keeper climbs high and gets to it first, collecting the ball with ease. The ball goes out of play. Inter are awarded a corner kick.
06:31 Event: Shots on target by Inter

10:38 Caption: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Hernanes (Inter). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

49:59 Caption: According to the statistics, the match was pretty entertaining. There were plenty of thrilling moments. The away team was superior today. The home side was creating their opportunities using lightning-fast counter-attacks. The tactic of the away side was slow build-up play.
    

    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In a thrilling clash at the Stadio Olimpico, Lazio faced Inter Milan in a captivating match that saw a rollercoaster of events and dramatic turns of fortune, ultimately ending with a narrow victory for the visitors. The match finished with a 2-1 scoreline in favor of Inter Milan, but it was the narrative unfolding between the kick-offs and the final whistle that captured the heartbeats of fans around the globe.

The match began with Lazio taking the initial kick-off. The opening moments were marked by a few breaks in play, including throw-ins and clearances from both sides, as the teams battled to establish early dominance. Lazio took a commanding step forward in the 7th minute, displaying their attacking intentions. After a quick succession of shots on target and an off-target effort, the ball found its way into the net. A beautifully orchestrated play saw Lazio scoring their opening goal. The crowd roared in approval as the scoreboard read 1-0 in favor of the home team.

However, Inter Milan was not to be thwarted easily. They kicked off immediately, showing their resolve to fight back. Their efforts soon resulted in a series of territorial advancements, although they encountered firm resistance from the Lazio defense. In the 11th minute, a foul by Inter prompted a yellow card for Danilo D'Ambrosio, setting the tone for what would be a combative half. Lazio's response to this incident was a confident display of possession and probing attacks, illustrating their cohesion and team chemistry.

The match witnessed a sequence of near-misses and defensive clearances, with both teams trading shots. Inter managed to snatch an opportunity in the 25th minute when Hernanes took a direct free-kick. His intelligent play saw the ball cutting under the defensive wall, nestling in the bottom left corner of the net, leveling the scores to 1-1. The equalizer invigorated Internazionale, and the game grew more intense as both sides pushed harder.

The strategic dynamics shifted dramatically when Lazio’s Mauricio was shown a red card for a severe challenge. Reduced to ten men, Lazio's plan required immediate adjustment. A tactical substitution saw Edson Braafheid come on for Stefano Mauri to bolster their defense. Despite the setback, Lazio managed to sustain pressure, albeit at the cost of further yellow cards and defensive shuffles.

Inter sensed an edge and pressed on. A significant opportunity arose when they were awarded a penalty after a horror tackle by Federico Marchetti, resulting in his dismissal and Lazio being reduced to nine men. Mauro Icardi stepped up to take the penalty, but his effort was brilliantly saved by Etrit Berisha, keeping the scores level for the time being and reinvigorating the home crowd’s hopes.

Even with the numerical disadvantage, Lazio fought valiantly. They created intermittent chances and maintained a defensive stance against Inter's relentless advances. The half came to a close with the scores tied and the tension palpable among supporters and players alike.

As the second half commenced, Inter opted for fresh legs, bringing Lukas Podolski into the fray, replacing Fredy Guarin. The visitors resumed with a display of controlled possession and intricate passing, aiming to exploit their numerical superiority. Lazio, however, stood firm, aiming to capitalize on any counter-attacking opportunities.

Inter's persistent efforts bore fruit when in the 38th minute of the second half, a stunning strike came from Hernanes. Collecting a precise through ball from Mateo Kovacic, Hernanes unleashed a powerful, unstoppable shot from the edge of the area, driving the ball into the bottom right corner and sending Inter 2-1 up.

The closing stages of the match were played with fervor and intensity, as Lazio desperately tried to claw back into the game. Inter, on the other hand, employed sheer tactical nous and collective energy to maintain their slender lead. Despite heroic saves by Etrit Berisha and some last-ditch efforts by Lazio's attackers, Inter held firm. They navigated through the late-game pressure with professional stoicism, minimizing errors and closing down assaults resolutely.

In the dying moments of the game, Lazio's frustrations saw Marco Parolo committing a foul, summing up a night of unfulfilled endeavors for the home side. Despite playing with heart, the disadvantage was too steep to climb. The final whistle saw relief and elation among Inter players and supporters as their tactical discipline and persistence paid dividends in a challenging away fixture.

The match concluded with Inter Milan securing a well-fought 2-1 victory over Lazio. For the neutral observer, the game was an engrossing spectacle of soccer, highlighted by its intensity, strategic interventions, and moments of brilliance. For Lazio fans, it was a story of what could have been, marred by sending-offs but illuminated by moments of resilience and fighting spirit.

Statistically, the match leaned in favor of Inter, whose method of slow build-up play proved successful against Lazio's counter-attacking strategy. The encounter between these two footballing giants reiterated the beauty and unpredictability of the sport, delivering a match rich in excitement, tactical battles, and raw emotions that will be remembered by all who witnessed it.
